about_the_game:
Moon is not the Limit is a narratively driven educational spaceflight simulation game designed to teach players about the science behind space travel.

Experience the journey as the newest astronaut to join the newly-formed Multi-national Aeronautics & Space Administration, MASA, as you answer space-related trivia to guide your rocket to a safe Moon landing!

Discover starfaring features:
  • A cast of voice acted characters to accompany you on your journey!
  • Compelling narrative-driven dialogue.
  • Trivia to test your astronomical knowledge.
  • Customize-able Quick-Time-Events so you can experience the perils of space at your own pace.

Afraid you don't have what it takes? Worry not! Your co-pilot and mission controller have your back with various dialogue comments about travel and life in space. Just sit back and remember to answer the questions posed correctly or your spaceflight may come to a sudden, and explosive, end.

Experience the journey as the newest astronaut to join the newly-formed Multi-national Aeronautics & Space Administration, MASA, as you answer space-related trivia to guide your rocket to a safe Moon landing!

Discover starfaring features:

  • Compelling narrative-driven dialogue.
  • Trivia to test your astronomical knowledge.
  • Customize-able Quick-Time-Events so you can experience the perils of space at your own pace.

Afraid you don't have what it takes? Worry not! Your co-pilot and mission controller have your back with various dialogue comments about travel and life in space. Just sit back and remember to answer the questions posed correctly or your spaceflight may come to a sudden, and explosive, end.

movies.name: The Moon is not the Limit

name: Moon is Not the Limit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD Phenom II X6 1100T
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Reach into orbit with Moon is not the Limit! Take to the stars as a recent recruit to the space program and learn all about the science behind space travel.
